text: José Carlos Carrasco Távara (1944 – 18 January 2015) was a Peruvian politician. He represented Piura from 2006 through 2011. Carrasco was a member of the Peruvian Aprista Party. He was born in the Sullana Province, Peru. Carrasco died in Lima, Peru on 18 January 2015 from lung cancer, aged 70. == References == == Other websites == *Official Congressional Site Category:1944 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Peru Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Peruvian politicians
title: José Carrasco
